cnc-main-applicant-full-name.label: Full name
cnc-main-applicant-full-name.hint: Enter the main applicant’s name exactly as it appears on their immigration document

cnc-main-applicant-dob.hint: Enter the date of birth as it appears in the main applicant’s immigration documents, for example 24 7 2000

cnc-main-applicant-nationality.label: Country of nationality
cnc-main-applicant-nationality.hint: This must match what is on the main applicant’s immigration document

cnc-who-is-completing.hint: This form must be completed by the same person who made the original request or their authorised legal repesentative

legal-rep.label: A legal representative
legal-rep.hint: This includes legal representatives of main applicants, document holders and sponsors

sponsor.label: A sponsor
sponsor.hint: Sponsor means that the application is based on the main applicant’s relationship with you

guardian.label: A dependant or guardian of a dependant
